title: pooya87
author: pooya87
content: [Image of a Palestinian child buried under ruble after Israel bombardment last week]Up until last month the record for the number of innocent children murdered was kept by head of the terrorist organization known as ISIS or Da'esh Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi. This rate was an average of 8 kids per day.But recently Benjamin Netanyahu the head of ISIS sister organization known as Israel broke that record. This record is now 144 kids per day.In Bitcoin terms each time we find a new bitcoin block on average (ie. every 10 minutes) a child is murdered and 2 more are injured in Gaza[1] by the order of Netanyahu and with the help of United States.A special congratulation is in order for the supporter of this terrorist organization, more specifically the pariah state in Washington DC.[1] https://www.unrwa.org/resources/reports/unrwa-situation-report-22-situation-gaza-strip-and-west-bank-including-east-Jerusalem

comments.author: Alpha Marine
comments.body: According to the Ministry of Health in Gaza, over 10,000 people have been killed and 4,104 of them are children. Gaza has been termed "a graveyard for children"These are very scary statistics. It is for reasons like this that wars should be avoided. Nobody wins in cases like this and the worst losses are the civilians and children.What was Hamas expecting when they attacked Israel? I know I might sound insensitive, but we have to talk about this stuff.Was Israel supposed to just watch while Hamas attacked them?Whenever I read the news about a war-stricken area, what I think about first is the innocent lives that would be lost. We don't have to pick sides and support.The fact that Israel can comfortably kill innocent civilians like it means nothing says a lot about them too. That being said, I can't fully believe anything that comes out of both the Palestinian and Israeli camps. We know how media are used to push propaganda.Funny enough, Israel didn't deny killing civilians but their excuse was "Hamas are using the civilians as human shields". What an excuse.But I also believe the numbers can be inflated or deflated to suit a narrative

comments.author: alani123
comments.body: I'm very disappointed by governments in NATO-alligned countries. All this bloodshed and not even one western government calling for an immediate ceasefire! This is beyond ridiculous. Just days into this genocide and Israel already approved oil drilling licences along the coast of Gaza...Just today, Justin Trudeau was caught fumbling his own words when he almost said that a ceasefire is needed, only to correct himself... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TwztLw9IRnQMost if not all western governments are so hypocritical on this matter that this is beyond belief. We're bearing witness to who's really controlling governance, and it's big capital and the war industry. Hopefully more people see the media and governments for what they really are through this. Here's to hoping things will change, because to a degree we're all responsible to what we have allowed our governments to do to the Palestinian people.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I would not have guessed the devastation in terms of people (innocent people getting killed in Gaza) was so big, but once you think about it: the high amount of people living in such a small area, it makes sense this toll would happen. I have purposely tried to avoid looking at pictures from war zones like those in Ukraine and Caza because I personally do not want to further disturb myself, but knowing these things are necessary if we intend to break the apathy and lack of sensibility many people around the world is facing when comes to this fighting in the middle east. At this point, I am not even sure whether Palestinian people will be able to forgive Israel someday for this "collateral damage".I hope God helps us all.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: pooya87 on November 07, 2023, 10:18:33 AMA special congratulation is in order for the supporter of this terrorist organization, more specifically the pariah state in Washington DC.The US cannot separate itself from this bloodbath. I have children I know how it feels when they have a little illness. They could be disorganised and remain restless until they get well. Now I have to consider the feelings and devastation of hearing your child scream your name under rubbles of heavy and rough broken stones but you don't know what to do because there is no equipment to help in their rescue. Some parents had to dig with crude tools or even their hands to rescue these innocent and beautiful creatures. The parent will keep hearing the shout for hours until it gets fainter and finally dies down. The devastations the US and Israel are causing in Gaza will not stop Hamas's attack on Israel rather it will give rise to a more radicalised set of fighters that have been hardened by these recent bombings. It will give rise to soldiers who will develop a deep hatred for Israel because of the loss of loved ones. Nevertheless, we pray for peace.
